connector.description:
Send data to Kafka topics wit TLS/SSL support.

The Kamelet is able to understand the following headers to be set:

- `key` / `ce-key`: as message key

- `partition-key` / `ce-partitionkey`: as message partition key

Both the headers are optional.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.bootstrapSe.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.bootstrapSe.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystore.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystoreLocation
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystore.description: The location of the key store file. This is optional for client and can be used for two-way authentication for client.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslProtocol.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslProtocol
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslProtocol.description: The SSL protocol used to generate the SSLContext. Default setting is TLS, which is fine for most cases. Allowed values in recent JVMs are TLS, TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2. SSL, SSLv2 and SSLv3 may be supported in older JVMs, but their usage is discouraged due to known security vulnerabilities.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.saslMechani.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.saslMechanism
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.saslMechani.description: The Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) Mechanism used.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslEnabledP.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslEnabledProtocols
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslEnabledP.description: The list of protocols enabled for SSL connections. TLSv1.2, TLSv1.1 and TLSv1 are enabled by default.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystore.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystorePassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeystore.description: The store password for the key store file.This is optional for client and only needed if ssl.keystore.location is configured.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslTruststo.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslTruststoreLocation
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslTruststo.description: The location of the trust store file.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeyPassw.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeyPassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.sslKeyPassw.description: The password of the private key in the key store file.

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.topic.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.topic.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.securityPro.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.securityProtocol
camel.kamelet.kafka-ssl-sink.securityPro.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. SASL_PLAINTEXT, PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL and SSL are supported
